sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-container>
      <!-- Top Bar -->
      <v-app-bar app color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <!-- Burger menu icon -->
        <v-btn icon @click="drawer = !drawer">
          <v-icon>mdi-menu</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
        <!-- Title -->
        <v-toolbar-title>{{ userName }}</v-toolbar-title>
        <v-spacer></v-spacer>
        <!-- Logout button -->
        <v-btn icon @click="logout">
          <v-icon>mdi-logout</v-icon>
        </v-btn>
      </v-app-bar>

      <!-- Sidebar -->
      <v-navigation-drawer app v-model="drawer" color="blue darken-2" dark>
        <v-list dense>
          <v-list-item
            v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
            :key="index"
            @click="navigate(index)"
          >
            <v-list-item-action>
              <v-icon>{{ item.icon }}</v-icon>
            </v-list-item-action>
            <v-list-item-content>
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.title }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item-content>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

      <!-- Main Content -->
      <v-main>
        <v-col cols="12" style="max-width: 800px; margin: 0 auto">
          <v-card class="mx-auto" max-width="600">
            <v-card-title class="blue darken-2 white--text"
              >Asesorías</v-card-title
            >
            <v-card-text>
              <v-row>
                <v-col cols="12">
                  <v-text-field
                    v-model="numberOfAsesorias"
                    label="Number of Asesorías"
                    type="number"
                    min="1"
                    readonly
                  ></v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-divider class="my-4"></v-divider>
                <v-col
                  v-for="(asesoria, index) in asesorias"
                  :key="index"
                  cols="12"
                >
                  <v-row>
                    <v-col cols="12">
                      <v-file-input
                        v-for="(file, fileIndex) in asesoria.files"
                        :key="fileIndex"
                        v-model="asesoria.files[fileIndex]"
                        :label="'Upload PDF for Asesoría ' + (index + 1)"
                        prepend-icon="mdi-upload"
                        accept="application/pdf"
                        :disabled="asesoria.submitted"
                        @change="validateFile(index, fileIndex)"
                      ></v-file-input>
                      <v-btn
                        v-if="
                          asesoria.files.length < numberOfAsesorias &&
                          !asesoria.submitted
                        "
                        @click="addFileInput(index)"
                        >Add another file</v-btn
                      >
                    </v-col>
                  </v-row>
                </v-col>
              </v-row>
            </v-card-text>
            <v-card-actions>
              <v-btn
                color="blue darken-2"
                @click="submitFiles"
                :disabled="allFilesSubmitted"
                >Submit All</v-btn
              >
            </v-card-actions>
          </v-card>
        </v-col>
      </v-main>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios'

export default {
  data () {
    return {
      drawer: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: 'Proyecto', icon: 'mdi-folder-outline' },
        { title: 'Asesorias', icon: 'mdi-account-plus-outline' }
      ],
      userName: localStorage.getItem('userName'), // Retrieve the user's name from localStorage
      numberOfAsesorias: 1, // Default to 1 asesoria
      asesorias: [{ files: [null], submitted: false }], // Initialize with one asesoria
      userId: localStorage.getItem('id')
    }
  },
  computed: {
    allFilesSubmitted () {
      return this.asesorias.every((asesoria) => asesoria.submitted)
    }
  },
  methods: {
    navigate (index) {
      switch (index) {
        case 0:
          this.$router.push('/student')
          break
        case 1:
          this.$router.push('/student/asesorias')
          break
        default:
          break
      }
    },
    logout () {
      localStorage.removeItem('token')
      this.$router.push('/login')
    },
    async submitFiles () {
      for (let i = 0; i < this.asesorias.length; i++) {
        if (!this.asesorias[i].submitted) {
          for (let j = 0; j < this.asesorias[i].files.length; j++) {
            if (this.asesorias[i].files[j]) {
              await this.submitFile(i, j)
            }
          }
        }
      }
    },
    async submitFile (index, fileIndex) {
      const asesoria = this.asesorias[index]
      const file = asesoria.files[fileIndex]
      if (file) {
        const formData = new FormData()
        formData.append('file', file)

        try {
          const response = await axios.post(
            'http://localhost:3000/upload',
            formData,
            {
              headers: {
                'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data'
              }
            }
          )

          if (response.status === 201) {
            this.$set(this.asesorias[index].files, fileIndex, {
              ...file,
              submitted: true
            })
            console.log(
              `File for Asesoría ${index + 1}, File ${
                fileIndex + 1
              } uploaded successfully!`
            )
          } else {
            console.error(
              `Failed to upload file for Asesoría ${index + 1}, File ${
                fileIndex + 1
              }.`
            )
          }
        } catch (error) {
          console.error(
            `Error uploading file for Asesoría ${index + 1}, File ${
              fileIndex + 1
            }:`,
            error
          )
        }
      }
    },
    async fetchAsesorias () {
      try {
        const response = await axios.get(
          `http://localhost:3000/users/${this.userId}`
        )
        const userData = response.data
        this.numberOfAsesorias = userData.asesorias // Set numberOfAsesorias to the value fetched from the backend
        this.asesorias = [] // Clear the asesorías array
        for (let i = 0; i < this.numberOfAsesorias; i++) {
          const asesoria = {
            files: Array.from(
              { length: userData.asesorias[i]?.files?.length || 1 },
              () => null
            ),
            submitted: userData.asesorias[i]?.submitted || false
          }
          this.asesorias.push(asesoria) // Initialize the asesorías array based on the fetched value
        }
      } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching asesorías:', error)
      }
    },
    addFileInput (index) {
      if (this.asesorias[index].files.length < this.numberOfAsesorias) {
        this.asesorias[index].files.push(null)
      }
    },
    validateFile (index, fileIndex) {
      const file = this.asesorias[index].files[fileIndex]
      if (file && file.type !== 'application/pdf') {
        this.$set(this.asesorias[index].files, fileIndex, null)
        alert('Only PDF files are allowed!')
      }
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.fetchAsesorias()
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-btn i {
  color: white;
}
</style>
